participant_1.background:
I watch my husband leave for work before I go to the basketball court.
i like to use candles instead of lights.
i own a black suburban.
i work at a gas station as a cashier.
I never thought I'd see a whale in person, but my sister and I saw a pod of them on our trip to the Galapagos.

participant_2.background:
I spend my days designing and sewing my own clothes.
my only friend is a dog.
I got fired from my job for speaking my mind too much.
i hate to workout , but i need to.
I find that reading about the history of the world and its philosophy helps me put my own troubles into perspective.

content.text: What kind of work do you do?
I'm currently unemployed. I got fired for speaking my mind too much.
Oh, that's too bad. I'm sorry to hear that. What kind of work did you do?
I was a cashier at a gas station.
I see. Well, I hope you find a new job soon.
Thank you. I'm trying.
I'm sure you will. What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to read and I like to design and sew my own clothes.
That's cool. I like to read too. I've never tried sewing, but it looks like it could be fun.
It is. It's a lot of work, but it's also very rewarding.
I can imagine. Do you sell your clothes?
I've thought about it, but I haven't gotten around to it yet.
Well, you should. I'm sure people would love to buy them.
Thanks. I'll think about it.
You're welcome. So, what do you like to read?
I like to read all sorts of things. I like history, philosophy, and science fiction.
Me too. I love history. What's your favorite historical period?
I'm not sure I have a favorite historical period. I like learning about all of them.
I can understand that. History is fascinating.
It is. It's so interesting to learn about how the world has changed over time.
I agree. I love learning about the different cultures and traditions that have existed throughout history.
Me too. It's amazing how different people can be from one another, yet we're all still human.
I know. It's a wonderful thing.
It is. I'm glad we have the opportunity to learn about different cultures and traditions.
Me too. It's one of the best things about being alive
